name: @MSN Emails
description: How'd I get the email reimagine@msn.com? In this post you'll find out. I discuss my path to discovering and reporting a Microsoft account creation captcha bypass exploit. I'll also explain how it's still possible (in 2023!) to create a microsoft account with an @msn.com email, with a step-by-step walk through. And, through the process I'll share some of the cool account's I've collected in the process.
